channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: 2 election officials in a rural Virginia city sue the state over ballot-counting machines
item.description: Two Republican election officials say in a lawsuit that they will not certify the results of the Nov. 5 election in a rural Virginia city unless the ballots are hand-counted —perpetuating a false notion that vote-tallying machines can be manipulated.

item.title: Report finds subway car that derailed near Boston was traveling 36 mph in 10 mph zone
item.description: A subway train that derailed near Boston earlier this month had entered a 10 mph zone traveling at 36 mph.

item.title: A century-old time capsule’s contents are unveiled in Kansas City
item.description: The contents of a time capsule that was entombed for a century in one of the nation’s preeminent World War I memorials have been revealed.
